title: Diesel Mechanic NEW!
full_description: We are looking for a Diesel Mechanic to join our team! You will be responsible for repairing various truck & trailer and complete DOT & BIT inspections. Competitive wages - rated at level of experience. You will need to have your own tools but a service truck will be provided.Responsibilities:Repair semi trucks & trailers, and other motor vehiclesPerform routine vehicle maintenance & PM servicesUse diagnostic tools to test vehicle componentsPerform quality inspections prior to returning the vehicle to the customerWelding & fabricating if neededQualifications:Previous experience as a mechanicKnowledge of mobile equipmentStrong mechanical aptitude and troubleshooting skillsDeadline and detail-orientedAbility to thrive in a fast-paced environmentSpeaking Spanish or Russian will be a plus
